attributes.action: FOR WOMEN WHO PAID FULL STAMP SINCE 1970,s TO GET THE PENSION THEY SPECIFICALLY PAID TO GET AT THE AGE OF 60 YEARS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many women specifically paid the full stamp as an option to receive their pension and retire at 60. Many have now been conned as it seems for many years into paying the full stamp and now not getting their pension until 65yrs of age

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
